projects.name: FriendFusion
projects.description: Developed a real-time chat application using the MERN stack for seamless communication and enhanced UX. Integrated secure login and signup processes through JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for robust user authentication and authorization facilitating over 95% login success rate. Employed Socket.IO to facilitate real-time user communication and display active users' online status, enhancing connectivity with an average response time of under 500 ms. Implemented an efficient search user functionality enabling swift user retrieval from the list of enrolled users.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Designed and developed a responsive personal portfolio website resulting in a 25% increase in visitor engagement. Involves a responsive, visually appealing, and user-friendly platform with a toggle button for switching between dark and light mode with over 70% of users utilizing this feature.

projects.name: Sync
projects.description: Crafted a sleek and functional music player resulting in a 20% improvement in user experience based on feedback. Implemented features allowing users to play, pause, skip tracks, visualize track progress and more.

experiences.description: Utilized the MERN stack to build and deploy full-stack food delivery application, ensuring seamless integration between front-end and back-end components. Participated in project planning meetings and enhanced website performance, UI/UX through optimization techniques contributing to a 20% increase in project completion speed.

Utilized C++ object-oriented programming to create robust software modules and contributed to the completion of over 3+ projects through effective teamwork. Employed Git for version control to effectively manage codebase changes, also collaborated with software engineering team to debug and troubleshoot C++ code.

full_output.name: Parv Sidana
achievements_and_awards: Achieved AIR of 461 in All India National Campus Aptitude Test (NCAT).
Achieved rankings of 140, 218, 232 in rated weekly coding contests on Code360 platform.
Proficiently solved 800+ DSA problems on prominent platforms-LeetCode, GFG, Code360.
Successfully completed the Google Cloud Study Jams at GDSC MAIT, Delhi.
Established a coding streak on LeetCode by consistently solving algorithmic challenges for 100+ days.
